column1: Little Goat Diner////Deocr: It should come as no surprise that this place has a hipster vibe to it. The d√©cor doesn't really allude to it that much
column2: it feels a bit more like a '70's diner to be honest
column3: but you can feel the vibe. You shouldn't hold that as a negative
column5: because it is very well lit (via natural light from the windows and HUGE skylight) and everything is very clean and open. The setup is nice too
column6: there are plenty of tables and booths of different sizes along with a counter you can sit at if rolling solo (like I was).
